about_message.message: Chrome to Phone, from Google, enables you to send links and other information from Chrome to your Android device. Chrome to Phone is comprised of a Chrome browser extension and an Android application.

app_desc.message: Google Chrome to Phone Extension enables you to send links and other information from Chrome to your Android device.

connectivity_error_message.description: Error message when there is a connection error with the server.

device_not_registered_message.description: Error message when we can't match a user to a device.

error_sending_message.description: Notice when link cannot be sent. $details$ is automatically replaced with the error text.

features_message1.message: Send browser links from Chrome to your phone.

features_message2.message: Google Maps links launch the Google Maps application on Android.

features_message3.message: YouTube links launch the YouTube application on Android.

features_message4.message: Selecting a phone number will automatically launch the dialer with the number populated.

features_message5.message: Selecting text on a Web page will copy the clipboard to Android (long press a text box to paste on Android).

invalid_scheme_message.description: Notice when user attempt to send a file link.
invalid_scheme_message.message: Only http or https pages supported.

sending_message.description: Notice when link is being sent to phone.

sent_message.description: Notice when link has been successfully sent to phone.

sign_in_message.description: Sign in phrase used in the context of 'Please sign in to Chrome to Phone'.

sign_in_required_message.description: Notice when sign in is required. $link$ is automatically replaced with 'sign in'.

signed_in_message.message: Signed in. You are now ready to send links to your phone.

signed_out_message.message: You are now signed out of Chrome to Phone.

step2_message.message: Search for 'Chrome to Phone' at chrome.google.com/extensions.

step3_message.message: Install the Chrome to Phone extension and click on the toolbar icon to sign in.

step4_message.message: Search for 'Chrome to Phone' in Market on your Android device.

step5_message.message: Install the Chrome to Phone Android app and complete the simple set-up process.

step6_message.message: Click the toolbar icon to send the link or currently selected text to your phone.
